entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 except minus 7 in a few localities. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 except minus 7 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 8:59 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:59 PM MST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
